title: How to earn farming?
paragraph: A mining system has been added to the game that provides another source of coins. Along with the autoplay system, the mining system is also measured by time, making the player have to go through the game from time to time to manage it.

title: How to earn playing?
paragraph: When collecting your purchased items you must activate them all. When activated, you will go to the market to collect the products and start playing. We will continue to indicate referring to all game modes. When purchasing the legendary promotion, you will guarantee the 3 game modes.
